name: Numix - Thunderbird Tray Icons

screenshots.caption: A preview of the icons, which are contained by the "Numix - Thunderbird Tray Icons" icon set

short_description:
"Numix - Thunderbird Tray Icons" is a icon set for the Linux GNOME-shell, whose purpose is to be used as tray icons for the mail client "Thunderbird". The icon pack contains a default icon and a icon, that indicates when unread messages are available.

This icon set has been created to be used together with the GTK-theme "Numix" and has been designed to optically fit into the appearance of the "Numix"-theme and the accompanying "Numix-uTouch"-icon theme.
summary: A GNOME icon set, which contains tray icons for "Thunderbird"
